page.title: 04Clubs
page.content: Guides were started in 1919_1920 by Lady Olivia Baden Powell and her husband Lord Baden Powell on October the 3rd 1923.Here in Shifnal the scouts and guides have never worked together in anything.In 1958 there was a meeting to decide where to place the Scout Group and Guide Company;the group was placed in St.Andrews church. In 1978 the scouts and guides decided that they wanted a place of their own. There were a lot of buildings possible for them to use. At last they decided on a patch of land called Dyers Bank between the church and Oakley's Garage.It used to be a telephone exchange.The plans were drawn up and they were all set to build when they did a test on the land and found that it was very marshy thirteen feet down,and it was unfit to build on.
